about_the_game:
This DLC include :
  • Chapter 0 : The First Night...
  • The Horde Mode...

In the first one called Chapter 0 : The first night :

  • You will see what happened to Catherine the sister of Nathan on the first night she went to Lencour mountain... This is Chapter 0!

In the second game mode called : The Horde Mode :

  • You will try to survive five 3min rounds with only the items you can get by collecting coins and opening chest... You can be lucky and have bonus powers such as : Boost Bonus, Ghost Bonus and Coins Bonus...

Good Luck!

*If you have any problem installing this DLC uninstall the game and reinstall it at the same time as the DLC, it should fix it.*

*The same process is needed to change the game language.*

content_descriptors.notes: This is a survival horror fps game so there will be zombies, blood, gore and gun but the game graphics are more cartoony than realistic so it seem less gore than some other realistic horror game...
